wikipedia_page.main: Marc Wyatt (born 15 September 1977) is a Welsh international lawn bowler.

link_mentions.page: Paul Taylor (lawn bowls)
response: He competed for Wales in the men's triples at the 2014 Commonwealth Games where he won a bronze medal with Jonathan Tomlinson and Marc Wyatt. In 2015 he won the triples silver medal and fours bronze medal at the Atlantic Bowls Championships.

link_mentions.page: Wales at the 2018 Commonwealth Games
Daniel Salmon (bowls)
response: He was selected as part of the Welsh team for the 2018 Commonwealth Games on the Gold Coast in Queensland where he claimed a gold medal in the Pairs with Marc Wyatt.
